metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8685 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Dolibarr ERP/CRM 3.8.3 and earlier allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) external calendar url or (2) the bank name field in the "import external calendar" page.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dolibarr - 3.5.8+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.8+dfsg1-1').
